turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm on my way to Starbucks. Can you order me a coffee to pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which one do you want to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in Brooklyn, heading toward the one in Williamsburg.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm looking up the address. The one at 154 N 7th St?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one. I'll be there in 5 or 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The big one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, one venti latte. What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any flavor in that latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want vanilla syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am guessing you don;t need sugar, then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, it'll be sweet enough with the vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you have them put whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll tell them. I know you like iced coffee. Is this hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks for mentioning that. I would like it iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, to confirm, it's a venti iced latte with vanilla syrup and whipped cream, no sweetener.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Will it be ready when I get there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They say 5 to 8 minutes, at the Starbucks on 7th Street in Brooklyn. You want me to use the Amex?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I have an account. I'll pay with my phone. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. See you later. Bye.
